sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @CurrencyCode AS NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @CurrencyCode = [LCY Code]
FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$General Ledger Setup]

DECLARE @CountryCode AS NVARCHAR(50)
DECLARE @Company_ID AS NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT
	@CountryCode = [Country_Region Code],
	@Company_ID = [Name]
FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Company Information];

WITH DetailedCustLedgerEntryCTE AS (
	SELECT
		[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_],
		SUM(Amount) AS Open_Amount,
		SUM(IIF(
				[Entry Type] IN (
					1 -- Initial Entry,
					--,2 -- Application
					,3 -- Unrealized Loss,
					,4 -- Unrealized Gain,
					,5 -- Realized Loss,
					,6 -- Realized Gain,
					,7 -- Payment Discount,
					,8 -- Payment Discount (VAT Excl.),
					,9 -- Payment Discount (VAT Adjustment),
					--,10 -- Appln. Rounding,
					--,11 -- Correction of Remaining Amount,
					,12 -- Payment Tolerance,
					,13 -- Payment Discount Tolerance,
					,14 -- Payment Tolerance (VAT Excl.),
					,15 -- Payment Tolerance (VAT Adjustment),
					,16 -- Payment Discount Tolerance (VAT Excl.),
					,17 -- Payment Discount Tolerance (VAT Adjustment)
				),
				Amount, 0
			)
		) AS Invoice_Amount
	FROM
		dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Detailed Cust_ Ledg_ Entry]
	GROUP BY
		[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_]
),
RetentionAmountCTE AS (
	SELECT [Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry]
		,SUM(Amount) [Retention Amount]
		,MAX([Due Date]) AS [Retention Due Date]
		,MIN([Description Invoice]) AS [Description Invoice]
	FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$DSI Holdback Customer]
	WHERE [Open] = 1
	AND [Holdback Code] IN ('GEWÄHR_5', 'SICH_10', 'DLZ')
	GROUP BY [Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry]
),
DisputeAmountCTE AS (
	SELECT [Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry]
		,SUM(Amount) [Dispute Amount]
	FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$DSI Holdback Customer]
	WHERE [Open] = 1
	AND [Holdback Code] NOT IN ('GEWÄHR_5', 'SICH_10', 'DLZ')
	GROUP BY [Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry]
),
Exclude2000sCTE AS (
	SELECT cle.[Entry No_]
	FROM
		dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Cust_ Ledger Entry] cle
		LEFT JOIN dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Customer] c ON cle.[Customer No_]=c.[No_]
	WHERE
		c.[No_] LIKE '2000%'
		AND cle.[Posting Date] = '20200101'
)
SELECT
	'Navision' as ERP,
	@Company_ID AS Company_ID,
	cle.[Customer No_] as Customer_No ,
	c.[Name] as [Name],
	dcle.Invoice_Amount as Document_Amount,
	dcle.Open_Amount,
	cle.[Entry No_] as CustomerLedgerEntryNumber,
	cle.[Document No_] as [Document No_],
	CASE cle.[Document Type]
		when 0 THEN 'N/A'
		WHEN 1 THEN 'PAYMENT'
		WHEN 2 THEN 'INVOICE'
		WHEN 3 THEN 'CREDIT MEMO'
		WHEN 4 THEN 'FINANCE CHARGE MEMO'
		WHEN 5 THEN 'REMINDER'
		WHEN 6 THEN 'REFUND'
		ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
	END [Document_Type],
	cle.[Posting Date],
	CASE
	WHEN sih.[Payment Terms Code]<>'' THEN sih.[Payment Terms Code]
	WHEN c.[Payment Terms Code]<>'' THEN c.[Payment Terms Code]
	ELSE null
	END as [Payment Terms Code],
	cle.[Due Date],
	IIF(cle.[Currency Code] = '', @CurrencyCode, cle.[Currency Code]) as Currency_Code,
	@CurrencyCode as Local_Currency,
	NULL as Purchase_Order,
	sih.[Order No_] as Order_No,
	cle.[Pmt_ Disc_ Given (LCY)] as Discount_Amount,--Discount Amount ???
	IIF(cle.[Pmt_ Discount Date]='1753-01-01', NULL, cle.[Pmt_ Discount Date]) as Discount_Due_Date,
	IIF(cle.[Closed at Date]='1753-01-01', NULL, cle.[Closed at Date]) as Clearing_Date,
	CASE
		WHEN c.[Customer Posting Group] LIKE 'IC%' OR c.[Customer Posting Group] IN ('MERGER', 'BETR_STAET','BETEILIG') THEN 'INTERCOMPANY'
		WHEN ISNULL(j.[Business Unit],'') <> '' THEN j.[Business Unit]
		ELSE dv.[Business Unit]
	END as Business_Unit,
	IIF((ISNULL(raCTE.[Retention Amount], 0.0) > 0.0), 1, 0) as Retention_Indicator,
	IIF(sih.[Ship-to Country_Region Code]='', @CountryCode, sih.[Ship-to Country_Region Code]) as Ship_To_Country_Code,
	IIF(cle.[Salesperson Code]='', NULL, cle.[Salesperson Code]) as [SalespersonCode],
	sp.Name as [SalespersonName],
	IIF(cle.[Global Dimension 2 Code]='', NULL, cle.[Global Dimension 2 Code]) as DSI_Job_No,
	cle.[Open],
	ISNULL(raCTE.[Retention Amount], 0.0) As [Retention_Amount],
	ISNULL(daCTE.[Dispute Amount], 0.0) As [Dispute_Amount],
	j.[No_] as [Kopro Code],
	IIF(raCTE.[Description Invoice] IS NOT NULL, raCTE.[Description Invoice], cle.[Description]) AS [Description],
	IIF(cle.[Closed by Entry No_]=0, ccle.[Closing Entry No_], cle.[Closed by Entry No_]) AS [ClosedByCustomerLedgerEntryNumber],
	raCTE.[Retention Due Date],
	IIF(cle.[User ID] = '', NULL, cle.[User ID]) AS User_ID,
    cle.[Entry No_] AS [Application ID],
    IIF(
		cle.[Closed by Entry No_] <> 0,
		(SELECT MIN([Document No_])
		FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Entry No_] = cle.[Closed by Entry No_]),
		(SELECT MIN([Document No_])
		FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Closed by Entry No_] = cle.[Entry No_])
	) AS Closed_By_Doc_Number,
	IIF(
		cle.[Closed by Entry No_] <> 0,
		(SELECT MIN([Entry No_])
		FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Entry No_] = cle.[Closed by Entry No_]),
		(SELECT MIN([Entry No_])
		FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Closed by Entry No_] = cle.[Entry No_])
	) AS Closed_By_Application_ID
FROM
	dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Cust_ Ledger Entry] cle
	LEFT JOIN dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Customer] c ON cle.[Customer No_]=c.[No_]
	LEFT JOIN dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Sales Invoice Header] sih ON cle.[Document No_] = sih.[No_]
	LEFT JOIN DetailedCustLedgerEntryCTE dcle ON cle.[Entry No_] = dcle.[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_]
	LEFT JOIN dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$DSI Job] j ON cle.[Global Dimension 2 Code] = j.No_
	LEFT JOIN dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Salesperson_Purchaser] sp ON cle.[Salesperson Code] = sp.Code
	LEFT JOIN RetentionAmountCTE raCTE ON raCTE.[Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry] = cle.[Entry No_]
	LEFT JOIN DisputeAmountCTE daCTE ON daCTE.[Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry] = cle.[Entry No_]
	LEFT JOIN Exclude2000sCTE  e2CTE ON cle.[Entry No_] = e2CTE.[Entry No_]
	LEFT JOIN dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Dimension Value] dv ON cle.[Global Dimension 2 Code] = dv.Code
	LEFT JOIN (select [Closed by Entry No_], MIN([Entry No_]) AS [Closing Entry No_] from dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Cust_ Ledger Entry] group by [Closed by Entry No_]) ccle ON cle.[Entry No_] = ccle.[Closed by Entry No_]
WHERE
	/*cle.[Document Type] != 1
	and*/
	c.[No_] != '99999' --do not extract documents for this customer
	and e2CTE.[Entry No_] IS NULL
	and c.Recycling != 1
